title: GridTable
description: Grid Table is a table view container in which labeled columns in a grid are used to present numbers, text, or even images in rows in a tabular format. Grid Table will automatically convert to an Object Table when displaying on a phone due to space constraints. Note: Grid Table does not support static content, `Target` binding must be used to populate the table rows.

Separators.description: To provide more flexibility with rendering of controls and sections, set the visibility of the separator lines.

enum.description: An information icon and a disclosure (chevron) control on iOS and web. An information icon only on Android.
A chevron-shaped control for presenting new content on iOS and web. Display as blank on Android.

AccessoryType.description: Optional accessory icon to be displayed in the cell. If both `AccessoryType` and `ProgressIndicator` are set, only the `ProgressIndicator` is shown.

Items.description: Array of GridRowItem that represent columns in the grid row

Layout.description:
The layout of columns in a Grid Table row.

If no `Layout` is specified, the space will be divided evenly among the row items.

If no `Layout` is specified for this section's `Header`, this one will be used for the header.

OnPress.description: Event triggered when the grid row is pressed

OnAccessoryButtonPress.description: In iOS, it is only triggered by pressing the 'detail button' if `AccessoryType` is set to detailButton or detailDisclosureButton. In Android, it is triggered for any `AccessoryType`.

DataPaging.description: Configure the loading indicator shown at the end of the list, when loading next page of data.

Search.description: Defines if search is to be enabled in the Grid Table.

Target.description: The binding target for the Grid Table. For each entry in the result of the binding, a grid row will be generated based on the Row configuration.

Footer.description: Footer bar to be displayed below this control's content section.

Header.description: Header bar to be displayed above this control's content section.

EmptySection.description: A section that will be displayed when the list is empty, this only applies if you are using Target binding. Allows you to show custom label when the list is empty.

DataSubscriptions.description: Array of data change events to subscribe to.
